Web Developer.

About Me

I'm a web developer coding in mainly PHP, but dabbling in languages, technologies and frameworks like Ruby, LESS, Puppet, Vagrant, FuelPHP and others. Currently, i'm a developer at Hydrant, while also being the sole developer on Simply Satisfied. Checkout my projects on Github, or follow me on Twitter.

Projects

  • Simply Satisfied

    Simply Satisfied is a quick way to collect customer feedback, build a survey, send email invites, and view your performance over time.

  • Req

    Req is a two-part tool for developers - a command line utility that lets you template HTTP requests using JSON documents, and a PHP class you can use in your applications to make using cURL requests easier.
